title: Poly Haven

title: Itchio

title: ambientCG

title: Share Textures
licenceDescription: "All of our content is copyright-free [CC0]. It means you can use them anywhere you want which includes commercial projects too."

title: CG Bookcase
licenceDescription: "The textures are published under the CC0 1.0 license, which means means you can use them for free without giving credit."

title: BlenderKit
licenceDescription: "BlenderKit only has 2 available licenses. Everything you download is available for commercial use. Both allow you to sell higher-level-derivative works, but royalty free license doesn't allow to re-sell 3D models even if modified."

title: Game Art 2D
licenceDescription: "For the game assets in Freebies section, it's under Creative Common Zero (CC0) a.k.a Public Domain license."
